DOC.detailed_description: Twenty-four forty-eight hour ( study day 1 ) prior inhalation challenge , subject undergo physical examination ear , nose , throat chest assessment vital sign ( temperature , pulse , respiratory rate , blood pressure ) , oxygen saturation , symptom score assessment undergo spirometry rule acute illness prior challenge . All female volunteer undergo urine pregnancy test . A similar examination take place immediately prior inhalation challenge 20,000 EU CCRE , well 30 , 60 , 120 , 180 , 240 , 300 360 minute 24 hour challenge ( exception pregnancy test administer prior sputum induction study day 1 ) . Induced sputum 24 48 hour prior challenge , six hour challenge Study day 2 . Sputum analyze PMN content , CD14 expression airway macrophage monocyte , soluble CD14 level , cytokine level sputum product inflammatory cell ( eosinophil , cationic protein , myeloperoxidase ) . Blood collect CBC differential pre- challenge induce sputum obtain 6 hour challenge 24 hour challenge . Blood lymphocytes 10 ml aliquot assess lymphocyte subset activation marker , well proliferative cytokine response . Blood also collect assessed whole blood assay marker inflammatory immune activation ( CD11b , CD14 , CD64 , CD16 , HLA-DR , CD45 , CD3 , CD80 , CD86 , CD83 , CD40 ) function ( phagocytosis oxidative burst ) three color flow cytometry . Plasma separate 4 ml frozen 70Â° C future analysis mediator interest , cytokine , well systemic effect endotoxin . Subjects discharge home contact information study staff . If volunteer unexpected complication shortness breath , decrease pulmonary function , unstable vital sign admit GCRC overnight observation . The next morning ( study day 3 ) subject return CEMALB final set vital sign , spirometry , symptom scoring , venipuncture examination study physician . Each volunteer give symptom score sheet day 96 hour ( 4 day ) challenge . Each sheet include name phone number study coordinator study MD . Sample home symptom score sheet instruction include protocol . Between 48 96 hour challenge , volunteer call determine status , inquire symptom , symptom scoring , need medication and/or physician visit . Between 7 10 day challenge dose , subject ask return study discontinuation visit . At time temperature , pulse , systolic diastolic BP , respiratory rate , FVC FEV1 SpO2 ( oxygen saturation ) , symptoms score assess , abnormal , medical evaluation direct study physician undertaken .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Healthy , nonallergic , nonasthmatic 1850 year old male females < 0.5 pack year history tobacco use negative allergy skin test , normal lung function , define ( Knudsen 1976/1984 predict set ) : 1 . FVC > 80 % predicted gender , ethnicity , age height 2 . FEV1 > 80 % predicted gender , ethnicity , age height 3 . FEV1/FVC ratio > 75 % predicted gender , ethnicity , age height Oxygen saturation > 94 % , Normal blood pressure ( Systolic 150 90 , Diastolic 9060 mm Hg ) , Symptom Score great 6 ( possible 24 ) total symptom score value great 2 one score . No score may great 2 , Negative methacholine inhalation challenge . On day challenge , body temperature must great 37.8 degree , measure orally . A history significant chronic illness ( include diabetes , autoimmune disease , immunodeficiency state , know ischemic heart disease , chronic respiratory disease chronic obstructive pulmonary disease asthma , hypertension ) . Allergy medication may use course study ( albuterol , acetaminophen , aspirin nonsteroidal antiinflammatory agent , corticosteroid , lactose ) . Positive pregnancy test within 48 hour time challenge . Medications may impact result endotoxin challenge , interfere medication potentially use study ( include steroid , beta antagonist , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory agent ) suggest ongoing illness ( antibiotic ) . Acute , nonchronic , medical condition , include ( limited ) pneumonia bronchitis require antibiotic , febrile illness , flulike symptom must totally resolve symptomatically 2 week . Unspecified illness , judgment investigator increase risk associate endotoxin inhalation challenge , basis exclusion . Persons employ within past 6 month occupation high risk endotoxin exposure ( specifically person work swine confinement facility , cotton storage grain storage site )
